name: .TA0
summary: Learn about .TA0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TA0 files with the desktop version of TaxAct 2020 in Windows.

You can also upload a TA0 file to TaxAct Online when uploading your tax data from the previous year. For example, you can upload a TA9 file to TaxAct Online when filing your taxes for the 2020 calendar year. Or if you are filing your 2021 taxes with TaxAct Online, you can then upload your TA0 file. To open a TaxAxt Desktop return file from a previous year with TaxAct Online, click Basic Info â†’ Data Import, click "import your [YYYY] Desktop return," then follow the prompts to upload the file.
